name: Helmet Hanger Wall Mount 180° Swivel Helmet Holder for Motorcycle Bike Racing Outerwear Sports Gear
short_description: Metal
Imported

This helmet mount wall mount is made of high quality aircraft grade aluminum. The material is fade-resistant, rust-resistant, durable, and can support a lot of weight, making it ideal for helmet storage. Plus, the 4.7-inch diameter support ball increases the contact surface with the helmet and helps keep it in good shape.

This helmet mount is perfect for those who want to save space. Easily mounts on the wall and swivels 180 degrees to display helmets or other items as desired. When not in use, it can be swiveled against the wall to take up less space.

This motorcycle helmet holder has two spheres - one higher than the helmet and one lower with double hooks to hold heavier items like coats or sports gear. It's a great way to store all your essentials in one place, whether you're on a car ride or need a place to hang your keys.

Can be hung on wall brackets for helmets such as open helmets, full face helmets, motorcycle helmets, baseball helmets, football helmets, bicycle helmets and hats. It's a great way to improve space utilization and make your home, showroom, hallway, balcony, study or living room look tidier.

Mounting the motorcycle helmet mount on the wall is quick and easy. First, mark the desired location on the wall. Next, drill two holes and insert the expansion tube. Finally, use the screws to secure the bracket in place. To finish, screw on the lid to cover the screws and keep the look clean.

name: Mandark Motorcycle Helmet Holder, 180° Rotation Motorbike Helmet Hanger Wall Mount with Double Hook, Motorbicycle Helmet Rack Accessories Compatible with Motorcycle Bike Outerwear (1PC)
short_description: 【Premium Material】: Our products are made of stainless steel and aluminum. Stainless steel has excellent strength and durability and is able to withstand large loads without being easily deformed or damaged. Aluminum has a lower density, thus making wall-mounted helmet racks relatively lightweight. This helps to reduce the load on the wall and makes it easier to install and remove the helmet holder.

【Integrated Double Hook Design】: Our products allow helmets to be hung securely on the wall, thus saving space and making them easy to access. Compared to placing your helmet randomly on the seat, the wall mounted helmet holder keeps your helmet more organized. In addition, the dual hooks at the bottom allow you to hang motorcycle keys, jackets and sportswear, thus expanding the wall storage space and making it more practical and convenient.

【Widely Application】: Our product can be used to hold a variety of helmets, such as motorcycle helmets, baseball helmets, soccer helmets and hats. It is suitable for installation in homes, garages, exhibition spaces, offices, motorcycle stores or anywhere you need to hang them, which can effectively improve space utilization. Its sphere part supports motorcycle helmets and the hook part is used to store motorcycle riding clothes, jackets, sportswear or keys for easy access.

【Easy to Install】: Installation of our product is simple and easy, you can easily mount it on the wall, door or any location you want. First of all, you should mark the mounting position on the wall. Next, you need to drill holes with a drill according to the position. Finally, you should mount the helmet bracket to the wall by fixing it with screws.

【180° Rotatable Design】: The helmet holder wall bracket is designed to rotate freely 180°, which greatly enhances the flexibility and convenience of use. By simply rotating the bracket, you can easily adjust the angle of your helmet or other display items, whether it's for organizing storage or for aesthetic display. When not in use, you can easily rotate the stand against the wall to make it fit against the wall, thus saving space.
product_description: Specifications: Material: stainless steel, aluminum Color: black Package Dimensions: 1pcs: 5.51 x 5.51 x 8.66 inches 2pcs: 4.84 x 4.84 x 13.98 inches Weight: 1pcs: 390g/13.76oz 2pcs: 720g/25.40oz Believe Us: -Place it wherever you want and take it freely. Our products can be placed in different locations, which is convenient for you to get what you need at any time. -Enlarged ball design, you can hang the hat without deformation. The ball design of our products not only effectively distributes the weight and prevents your helmet or hat from being deformed due to prolonged hanging, but also ensures that they always remain in a good shape, thus making your gear look more fashionable and stylish. -180° free rotation design, which is space-saving and safe. When you are not using the helmet, you can easily rotate it to the wall position, thus greatly saving wall space. -Large weight-bearing capacity, which can achieve multi-functional storage. In addition to being a helmet holder, our product also has a large weight-bearing capacity and can easily store keys, cell phones, wallets and other daily necessities. This multi-functional design makes your life more organized.
